com.teaminternational.coe.utils.report

Class CustomAspect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teaminternational.coe.utils.report.CustomAspect

  • public class CustomAspect
extends java.lang.Object
    Aspect class. Custom implementation of aspect that creates Allure lifecycle and write steps with details into report for each execution of any method from pages and tests packages
    Version:
    1.0 01/10/18
    Author:
    Vladyslav.Yegorov@teaminternational.com
    See Also:
    AllureLifecycle, Aspect, Pointcut, Around

      • getLifecycle

        public static io.qameta.allure.AllureLifecycle getLifecycle()
        Create a new AllureLifecycle instance if it's not created before and store in private static variable
        Returns:
        current saved or created AllureLifecycle

      • arrayToString

        private static java.lang.String arrayToString(java.lang.Object... array)
        Create a new AllureLifecycle instance if it's not created before and store in private static variable
        Parameters:
        array - Array tham must be converted to string
        Returns:
        current saved or created AllureLifecycle

      • anyPageMethod

        public void anyPageMethod()
        Defines pointcut for aspect. Specify to implementation of aspect for execution of any method in package com.teaminternational.coe.pages

      • anyTestMethod

        public void anyTestMethod()
        Defines pointcut for aspect. Specify to implementation of aspect for execution of any method in package com.teaminternational.coe.tests

      • anyTestExampleMethod

        public void anyTestExampleMethod()
        Defines pointcut for aspect. Specify to implementation of aspect for execution of any method in package com.teaminternational.coe.tests.example

      • step

        public java.lang.Object step(org.aspectj.lang.ProceedingJoinPoint joinPoint)
                      throws java.lang.Throwable
        Describes implementation of aspect method instead of any method in pages and tests packages. Starts Allure step with name of the executed method, make execution of method, write success or broken status to allure step, and stop step in the end.
        Parameters:
        joinPoint - method's pointer which replaced by aspect's method step
        Returns:
        result of execution method that was replaced by aspect's method step
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable - in case of error
